text: junim-ui jingpyoleul almyeonseodo geu geos-eul geoyeoghago geuui son-i mueos-eul haessneunji alji moshaneun ja boda saaghan ja nugu-inyo geulihayeo hananim eun geudeul-ui ma-eum-eul bonghani ihaeha ji moshago geudeul-ui gwileul mag-euni deudji moshalila geuleomeulo geudaega geu deul-eul bog-eum-eulo indohanda hayeodo geudeul-eun gyeolko baleun gil-eul ttaleuji anh-eul geos-ila
